'''Cabin Boy''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Cabin Boy is a male entertainer in The King's Coffin. He specializes in oils and full body rubdowns.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* For {{cp2|200}}, you can get [Cabin Boy's Relaxation Therapy](/statusEffectsDeadfireProstituteBonuses/): +1 [Dexterity](/dexterity/), +1 [Perception](/perception/), -20% Hostile effect duration.
}}

[Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)
